ygData.subject: Greetings and a ?

ygData.messageBody:
Well EQ got me hooked.
I started playing about 2 months ago and am really enjoying
myself. But I am stuck. I use the diff. infomation and maps you can
find on the net as well as equipment list ect to help me find things
for quests ect. well I am stumped...

I am working on a High Elf Pally and am really enjoying building this
guy up. I started working on the Felwithe Defenders Falchion quest.
I am 8th level and the quest is rated 10th to 15th level.I started
the quest (talking to the Seria elf in the pally house) I killed the
masked spy and the Gen. Orc (with the help of a Dwarf with a Big
hammer.) (Note: the Spy and the Gen. Orc can be found talking
together at -2096.28, 2326.77 in Greater Faydark)and they can be
pulled with spells one at a time) I got their heads and turned them
in to Seria and got the dull sword I'm to sharpen the sword, and turn
it in with some arborean amber and a P.forest drakeling scale to get
the first pally sword....well the dum sword will not sharpen, I use 1
and 2 sharping stones, the sword and put them in the forge in the
armorer's shop and I'm told "these idems will not combine try another
forge...WHAT other forge?? My first ? is..is there another forge in
the high elf city and if so where or is it because I am only 8th
level?

my 2nd ? is on the first Pally armor quest where or what in the name
of all the good gods can I find or what is "Brick of crude Bronze"
and where can I find/make them (I need 2 for my first peace of armor)

Thanks

Slicesi
High Elf Pally
No Guild
Newbie
